30: dialog snowman Why are you intruding upon the great Snow King's castle, penguin?
dialog tux The reign of the Snow King is over!
dialog tux I'm taking him out! There's no way I'm letting him take away my fish!
dialog snowman That's all you care about? A measly tax?
dialog snowman I was going to let you leave in peace, but you leave me no choice.
